Anyone know where I can find a 2 man pod without installing an entire parts package or mod? Right now I'm just using a modded 3 man pod I dropped in the advanced rocketry node. It does the trick but I wouldn't mind one that looks different.

Thought about making my own but I'm no artist lol.

This request for a light Add-on has been lightly pushed into General Add-on Affairs.

You might try this WIP [thread=98250]2-Kerbal Command Pod[/thread].

The K2 pod is what I'm using: 1.25m pod with a 1.25m base (that looks like a Mk 1 capsule base), a 0.625m top (that looks nice with the small parachute), and a general Gemini-y shape. Unfortunately the links in that post are removed, but just search it on Curse or Kerbal Stuff.
There's a link in the thread now.

there is also this little one off by orionkerman a two man 1.25m gemini-a-like with a functional IVA and great visibility

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98063-Planning-to-start-a-collection-of-small-part-pack-mods-Dev-build-available
Awesome, thanks guys, I installed them all lol. That WIP pod is beautiful.
